effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 776,974 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 307,469.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.
(2) Set: Holy Shock's healing is increased by 10% and its cooldown is reduced by 10%.
(4) Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.

spells.description: Use: Be the center of attention. (10 Sec Cooldown)

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Unbound Changeling

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to grant you 4,579 Haste for 12 sec.

description: This strange critter has a rather unsettling habit of staring at you while you eat.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,770 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 178 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
